mindaffectBCI.decoder.offline.read_mindaffectBCI.read_mindaffectBCI_message(line)¶
mindaffectBCI.decoder.offline.read_mindaffectBCI.read_mindaffectBCI_messages(fn: str, regress: bool = True)¶

read the data from a text-file save version into a list of messages, WARNING: this reads the messages as raw, and does not try to time-stamp clocks

w.r.t. the message source. To compare messages between clients you will need to do this manually!

mindaffectBCI.decoder.offline.read_mindaffectBCI.read_serverts(line: str)¶
